messages.subject: Re Guns
messages.msgSnippet: Robin First, I live in a country where guns at not the norm.  In New Zealand the ordinary person does not own a gun.  Only those who hunt or belong to a gun
messages.messageBody:
Robin
First, I live in a country where guns at not the norm. In New
Zealand the ordinary person does not own a gun. Only those who hunt
or belong to a gun club have guns - and the person has to be
licensed. So I have been brought up without guns any way. I have
never had a gun in the house, even as a child. A friend did have a
gun. I was at his home one day when he was showing dh it. It was not
loaded and I new this - but it scared me to death.

OK so I do get your point re. toys and cars etc - infact I guess we
are at more risk just crossing the road..........

But I still dont like guns
Marianne
